question: Fed decision in January?
rule:
The **FED interest rates** are defined in this market by the upper bound of the target federal funds range. The decisions on the target federal fund range are made by the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meetings. 

 The resolution source for this market is the FOMC's statement after its meeting scheduled for January 30 - 31, 2025 according to the [official calendar](https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomccalendars.htm.) 

 The level and change of the target federal funds rate is also published at the official website of the Federal Reserve at https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/openmarket.htm. 

This market may resolve as soon as the FOMC's statement for their January meeting with relevant data is issued or up to 12 hours after. If no statement is released by the end date of the next scheduled meeting, this market will resolve to 'no change'.

question: Bitcoin Price: OVER/UNDER $100K after Trumps inauguration day?
rule: Using Coinbase Spot price for BTC/USD

question: Nottingham Forest @ Bournemouth (2025-01-25)
rule:
### Market Rule
This market resolves based on the outcome of the event: **Nottingham Forest @ Bournemouth (2025-01-25)**.

- The resolution source will be official match results from the governing body.
- If the event is postponed or canceled, the market will be voided.

question: Will Trump create Bitcoin reserve in first 100 days?
rule:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the US government holds any amount of Bitcoin in its reserves at any point between January 20, 2025, ET and April 29, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

 Note that the US government confiscating Bitcoin does not count as holding Bitcoin reserves. 

 The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government and/or the US federal reserve, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Washington Commanders @ Philadelphia Eagles (2025-01-26)
rule: This market resolves based on the final score reported from SPORTS-API for the NFL game Washington Commanders @ Philadelphia Eagles on 2025-01-26. The official resolution source is SPORTS-API.

question: How many times will Taylor Swift be shown on broadcast at Super Bowl LIX?
rule:
This market will resolve to the number of times Taylor Swift is shown on-screen, between the start of the National Anthem and the final whistle, during the official broadcast of Super Bowl LIX on Fox. 

 Times refers to discrete instances where Taylor Swift is clearly visible. These instances must be separated by shots where Taylor Swift is not clearly visible on screen.

question: Will rekt/Anthony (@cypherpunk669) change the batteries in his smoke detectors before @MetisL2's space w/ @AqualisProtocol on Feb. 4?
rule:
### **Resolution Criteria:** 

 This market will resolve based on whether rekt/Anthony (@cypherpunk669) has changed the batteries in his smoke detectors before the start of the scheduled **Metis x Aqualis Twitter Space on February 4, 2025**. 

 - **YES:** If rekt explicitly confirms (via tweet, reply, or verifiable statement) that he has changed the batteries in his smoke detectors **before the Twitter Space begins and the listeners can't hear the smoke detector beeping**.
- **NO:** If rekt/Anthony has **not confirmed** that he changed the batteries before the Twitter Space begins, or if the smoke detector beeping is clearly audible during the Space.
- **OTHER:** If the Twitter Space does **not** take place as scheduled due to reasons such as:
  - A different host leading the space instead of @MetisL2.
  - The Space being **canceled or postponed** beyond February 4.
  - **Twitter/X technical issues** preventing the Space from happening.
  - **Any other unforeseen event** (e.g., platform bugs, acts of God) that makes the original conditions of this market unresolvable.

 ### **Additional Notes:** 
- The primary method of verification will be Anthony's own statements or **publicly available evidence** from the Space.
- If there is **no clear confirmation or conclusive audio evidence**, the market will resolve as **NO**.
- The final resolution will be determined at the discretion of the market operator based on publicly available information 


 **[Link to the X/Twitter Space](https://x.com/i/spaces/1djxXrWkAAVGZ)**

question: Metis price above $50 on March 1st? (closes on Feb 19)
rule:
### **Resolution Criteria:**
This market will resolve based on the **on-chain oracle price** provided by [Pyth Network](https://www.pyth.network/).

At **00:01 UTC on March 1, 2025** (**7:01 PM EST on February 28, 2025**), the METIS price will be evaluated: \n\n- **YES:** If the **Pyth Network oracle price for METIS** is **strictly above $50.00** at the specified timestamp.
- **NO:** If the **Pyth Network oracle price for METIS** is **$50.00 or below** at the specified timestamp.\n\n ### **Additional Notes:**
- The market will **close early on February 19, 2025**, and no further trades will be allowed after this date.
- The **only** valid price source for resolution will be **Pyth Network's on-chain oracle**.
- The resolution timestamp is **00:01 UTC on March 1, 2025**, which converts to **7:01 PM EST on February 28, 2025**.
- The final resolution will be determined at the discretion of the market operator based on the oracle data.
